text: Sunu Lakshmi (27 October 1991–present) is an actress from India who works in Tamil and Malayalm films.https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/mollywood/290616/actor- and-dreamer-sunu-lakshmi.html ==Career== She started her acting career in a Telefilm called Shakunam directed by Biju Chandran and Telecast in Dooradarshan in 2006. Her first after that she was in Sengathu Bhoomiyile directed by Rathinakumar. Then her next project Eppothum Vendral directed by Siva Shanmugan. Touring Talkies directed by S. A. Chandrasekhar. Malayalam movie Snehamulloral Kudeullapol directed by Riju Nair. She starred in Aramm.https://www.newindianexpress.com/entertainment/tamil/2017/nov/24/aramm- is-a-social-drama-sunu-lakshmi-talks-about-her-experience-with- nayanthara-1709464.html ==Personal life== She attended a school run by Seventh-day Adventists. She completed her degree at Annamalai University. ==Filmography== *All films are in Tamil, unless otherwise noted. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Film !! Role !! title: Sunu Lakshmi
